tool_description: Get the basic metadata on all breeds of dogs from around the world. This API allows users to retrieve detailed information about various dog breeds, including their origins, fur colors, and more.

api_list.name: Paginated
api_list.description: Get all dog breed results in a set of 10 per page.

api_list.name: Order by Descending
api_list.description: Gives a list of all dogs sorted in descending order by name.

required_parameters.name: ordering
required_parameters.description: Parameter to specify the order of the results.

api_list.name: Order by Ascending
api_list.description: Gives a list of all dogs sorted in ascending order by name.

required_parameters.name: ordering
required_parameters.description: Parameter to specify the order of the results.

api_list.name: Origin
api_list.description: Gives a list of all dogs with the origin country.

required_parameters.name: origin
required_parameters.description: Country of origin for the dog breeds.

api_list.name: Fur Color
api_list.description: Gives a list of all dogs with the color as provided in the parameter.

required_parameters.name: furColor__icontains
required_parameters.description: Color of the fur to filter the dog breeds.

api_list.name: Breed Type
api_list.description: Gives all results by the type of breed.

required_parameters.name: breedType
required_parameters.description: Type of breed to filter the results.

required_parameters.name: search
required_parameters.description: Keyword to search for specific dog breeds.

api_list.name: Single Dog Breed
api_list.description: Gives details of a single dog breed.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of the dog breed to retrieve details.

api_list.name: All Dog Breed
api_list.description: Gets details of all dog breeds.
